bib.title: XML-based learning scenario representation and presentation in the adaptive E-learning environment
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemyslaw and Sobecki, Janusz
bib.venue: … Conference on Industrial, Engineering and Other …
bib.abstract: E-Learning environments nowadays should adapt to their users and computer platforms they are using. In this paper the learning scenario collaborative recommendation based on consensus method using XML is presented. We present the XML description of the learning scenario and its components as well as the link database and XSL transformations for presenting them on given platforms in the way suitable for particular students.
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Industrial, Engineering and Other Applications of Applied Intelligent Systems
